Package server.dbLogic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomerDBLogic
    This class responsible to rule on all the customer DB Logic with all the requests from the server.
    DBConnector
    this class is responsible to connect the system to the DB and initialize the DBLOGIC classes
    EmployeeDBLogic
    This class is responsible on send querys to the DB and get/insert/update/delete Data from the data base and send it back to the server controller with the answer about the request that has been sent.
    FuelDBLogic
    This class is responsible on send querys to the DB and get/insert/update/delete Data from the data base and send it back to the server controller with the answer about the request that has been sent.
    OrderDBLogic
    This class is responsible on send query to the DB and get/insert/update/delete order data from the data base and send it back to the server controller with the answer about the request that has been sent.
    PurchaseModelDBLogic
    This class responsible to rule on all the purchase model DB Logic with all the requests from the server.
    ReportDBLogic
    This class is responsible on send queries to the DB and get/insert/update/delete Data from the data base and send it back to the server controller with the answer about the request that has been sent.
    SaleDBLogic
    This class is responsible on send querys to the DB and get/insert/update/delete Data from the data base and send it back to the server controller with the answer about the request that has been sent.
    UserDBController
    This class responsible to rule on all the user DB Logic with all the requests from the server.
